chunks.chunk_text: Hi there 歡迎收聽通勤學英語 helping you learn English the most natural wayYou are now listening to Daily English Shadowing with John如果你是常常收聽我們節目的通勤家族那在廣聽我們節目後一定有發現自己對聽全英的抗拒以及句子和單字語感的熟悉度逐漸的增加那再來應該挑戰什麼呢?就可以強化口說啦我們可以將你每集從聽三遍縮減到聽兩遍或一遍剩下的時間

chunks.chunk_text: Famosa Circus' performance titledHashtag Since 1994 offers a reflection of contemporary views on womenThe Double Theatre's The Way Back utilizes lights, sounds, words and puppetry to provide a thought-provoking commentary on today's worldLastly,0471 Acrophysical Theatre will stage duo, delving into the dynamic nature of personal relationships
